Was surprised that even outdoor pictures had lot of noise with auto mode. Picture sizes are What setting can I use to take indoor (Museum) pictures and also outdoor pictures. I am not a photographer. Using auto mode. Did not edit pictures after taking them. My old Kodak 5MP D series pictures are lot better than these pictures. But have seen better pictures by G11 on flicker and here. Bought new canon G11. But very disappointed with image quality and noise. Tried both indoor and outdoor. Want
